cti:Collection.dc:description: Funded by a three-year grant from the National Endowment for the Humanities, the Women's Genre Fiction Project houses over 250 electronic editions of fiction written by British and American women from 1860-1920.
cti:Collection.dc:publisher: Lewis H. Beck Center for Electronic Collections and Services
